thread.title: Volvo wants robots to help collect your garbage
thread.title_full: Volvo wants robots to help collect your garbage

title: Volvo wants robots to help collect your garbage
text: Volvo wants robots to help collect your garbage Sunday, 20 September 2015 (21 minutes ago) To call garbage collection an inglorious job would be an understatement -- it typically involves early mornings, monotony and (of course) lots of smelly trash. It's the perfect sort of job for a robot, don't you think? Volvo agrees. It's partner...
